title: 'Worst I've ever met' - Harry Kane and Bayern Munich fume at 'catastrophic' referee after being held to draw by Hamburg
desc: Bayern Munich and forward Harry Kane have been left fuming at the referee of the Bavarian giants' game against Hamburg, feeling aggrieved over a number of decisions that they believe did not go their way. Kane was on the scoresheet, but was unable to stop Bayern dropping points for a second consecutive Bundesliga games this season after they drew 2-2 in north Germany.
